Only click this decision if you are the host/GM!
Click to show all host decisions
Click to hide all host decisions
Click to ally all countries in the game
Click to unally all countries in the game
Grant Military Access to All Countries
Click to grant military access to all countries in the game. Manually remove the mil access given to the country or countries you want to set as targets for the decisions.
Remove Mil Access Given to All Countries
Click to remove military access given to all countries in the game
Click to transfer the host nation flag to the target nation.
Click to kick all target player-countries from the game.
Click to unoccupy all non-rebel occupations in target countries.
Choose a Target Country to be the Occupier
Click to pick a target country to be the occupier, after clicking this a new decision will unlock allowing you to choose which countries will be sieged by this target country.
Siege All Target Countries to the Occupier
Click this to siege all target countries to the occupier you picked earlier
Clicking this decision will disable crisies for the entire game.\nThe decision will only be visible till 1837!
Change Tag to the Target Country
Clicking this decision will change your tag to the target country.
Enable Host Flag Following Tag Changes
Clicking this decision will make it so when you change tag, the host nation flag will follow to the nation you swap to.
Disable Host Flag Following Tag Changes
Clicking this decision will disable the host flag following your tag swaps again.
Set a Player to Tag Switch to a Target Country.
Click this decision to set a target country as the player to move to the destination tag with the next decision.
Set The Destination Tag to a Target Country.
Click this decision to set a target country as the destination tag, and move the initially selected player to said tag.
Clicking this decision will reset the countries flagged for tag swaps
Increase the Infamy of All Target Countries by 1
This decision gives all target countries 1 infamy, can be used consecutively to give a specific amount of infamy.
Decrease the Infamy of All Target Countries by 1
This decision reduces all target countries by 1 infamy, can be used consecutively to give a specific amount of infamy.
Clicking this decision will open a menu allowing you to decide how long the sanctions for the targets will last. Use only if someone's been real naughty.
Automatically allies all player nations. DO NOT SPAM.
Enables total annexation CBs for players in the game. (Requires no building)
Disables the safety on enabling Total Annexation CBs.
Grants a modifer that replenishes the highest possible amount of diplo points per month (Only on month ticks)
